vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Καναναῖος, -ου, ὁ or Καναναῖος
(late Heb. קָנָא),
1. an emulator, zealous admirer or follower , [5th/4th c.BC], etc.
2. a zealot , used to translate Κανανίτης or Καναναῖος (from the Hebr. qana, to glow, be zealous) , [Refs 1st c.AD]
vocabInfos.shortDef: Zealot, Cananaean (not related to geographical terms Cana or Canaan); same as G2208, "zealot"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Zealot, Cananaean (not related to geographical terms Cana or Canaan); same as G2208, "zealot"
a Canaanite, Mt. 10:4; Mk. 3:18*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
原意為"熱心,狂熱",在新約用來稱呼耶穌的門徒西門,因為他以前可能隸屬"激進"或"自由戰士"黨派
因此和合本譯為"奮銳黨的" (太 10:4; 可 3:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
原意为"热心,狂热",在新约用来称呼耶稣的门徒西门,因为他以前可能隶属"激进"或"自由战士"党派
因此和合本译为"奋锐党的" (太10 :4; 可3:18)
